price: (6) And as for ʿAad, they were destroyed by a screaming,[1737] violent wind
arabic: وَأَمَّا عَادٞ فَأُهۡلِكُواْ بِرِيحٖ صَرۡصَرٍ عَاتِيَةٖ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wa-ammā ʿādun fa-uh'likū birīḥin ṣarṣarin ʿātiyatin
